htds.Alert

      Methods in htds that return Alert 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Alert[] DBConnector.getAlerts()
      This method queries the database for previously generated alerts and return all available alerts Reference: [Design Document v6.0]: 5.3 Sequence Diagram 3: View Alerts
      Alert[] DBConnector.getAlerts(java.sql.Date startDate, java.sql.Date endDate)
      This method queries the database for previously generated alerts and return alerts generated within a date period Reference: [Design Document v6.0]: 5.3 Sequence Diagram 3: View Alerts
      Alert[] DBConnector.getAlerts(int alertProfileLogID)
      Sequence Diagram 3: View Alerts
      To get the profile of the given alert.
      Alert[] DBConnector.getAlerts(java.lang.String string, int type) 
      Alert[] DBConnector.getAlerts(User user)

      Generates a random Object of type Alert
